categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: A fighter wing of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Massassi Group was active during the Galactic Civil War. The fighter wing consisted of all of the starfighter squadrons stationed at Base One, the headquarters for the Alliance High Command and the Massassi Group's base. Alliance Starfighter Command General Antoc Merrick was in command of the fighter wing when its squadrons were scrambled. When the fighter wing was better deployed operationally from a ground-based dispatch or if General Merrick were absent, General Jan Dodonna of Sector Command and the Massassi Group would take command.
